html:
Portugal have booked a place in this year‚Äôs Nations League final with a 2-1 win over Germany on Wednesday.

Germany took the lead through Florian Wirtz in the 48th minute, but Francisco Conceicao leveled the score with this excellent strike in the 63rd, before he assisted Cristiano Ronaldo to bring victory for Portugal.
